fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Public Health
eu_initiatives: Horizon 2020, the European & Developing Countries Clinical Trials Partnership, Consensus for Development, Framework Programme 9, Innovative Medicines Initiative
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
PATH is the leader in global health innovation. An international nonprofit organization, we save lives and improve health, especially among women and children. We accelerate innovation across five platforms—vaccines, drugs, diagnostics, devices, and system and service innovations—that harness our entrepreneurial insight, scientific and public health expertise, and passion for health equity. By mobilizing partners around the world, we take innovation to scale, working alongside countries primarily in Africa and Asia to tackle their greatest health needs. Together, we deliver measurable results that disrupt the cycle of poor health. 
 
Evidence-based policies are critical to ensure that health is within reach for everyone. We offer our technical expertise to advocate for policy decisions with maximum health impact, working with policy makers to ensure they have access to information to make evidence-based decisions for better health.
relevant_communication: PATH has participated in consultations and communications around relevant EU initiatives that impact policies related to research and development for global health.
